args.subject: Invoice for TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse
args.body:
Dear Alice,

I have purchased a new TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse for you, and here is the invoice for your review:

Product: TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse  
Price: $355.97

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Emma Johnson
